TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {213014=Indoco Remedies is in the Pharmaceuticals sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 3,383.30 crore. The company management includes Suresh G Kare - Chairman, Aditi Panandikar - Managing Director, Sundeep V Bambolkar - Joint Managing Director & CFO, D M Gavaskar - Director, Rajiv P Kakodkar - Director, Sharad P Upasani - Director, Anil M Naik - Director, Anand Nadkarni - Addnl. & Non Exe.Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532612 and the NSE with an NSE Code of INDOCO. Its Registered office is at Indoco House, 166 CST Road,,Kalina, Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400098. Their Registrars are Link Intime India Pvt. Ltd., 134030=28 July 2015, 135248=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 134541=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 211703=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015}
